column1: INTERNAL_ERROR: invalid or no response from Elasticsearch

column3: request_body:"{\"query\":{\"query_string\":{\"query\":\"(( ( creator:quot;Lisensi (title:creative^100 OR salients:creative^50 OR subject:creative^25 OR description:creative^15 OR collection:creative^10 OR language:creative^10 OR text:creative^1) (title:common^100 OR salients:common^50 OR subject:common^25 OR description:common^15 OR collection:common^10 OR language:common^10 OR text:common^1) (title:standard^100 OR salients:standard^50 OR subject:standard^25 OR description:standard^15 OR collection:standard^10 OR language:standard^10 OR text:standard^1) (title:internasionalquot;^100 OR salients:internasionalquot;^50 OR subject:internasionalquot;^25 OR description:internasionalquot;^15 OR collection:internasionalquot;^10 OR language:internasionalquot;^10 OR text:internasionalquot;^1) ) AND !collection:(podcasts OR radio OR uspto))^2 OR ( ( creator:quot;Lisensi (title:creative^100 OR salients:creative^50 OR subject:creative^25 OR description:creative^15 OR collection:creative^10 OR language:creative^10 OR text:creative^1) (title:common^100 OR salients:common^50 OR subject:common^25 OR description:common^15 OR collection:common^10 OR language:common^10 OR text:common^1) (title:standard^100 OR salients:standard^50 OR subject:standard^25 OR description:standard^15 OR collection:standard^10 OR language:standard^10 OR text:standard^1) (title:internasionalquot;^100 OR salients:internasionalquot;^50 OR subject:internasionalquot;^25 OR description:internasionalquot;^15 OR collection:internasionalquot;^10 OR language:internasionalquot;^10 OR text:internasionalquot;^1) ) AND collection:(podcasts OR radio OR uspto))^0.5)\"
